name: Common Cold: Style tweaks
description:
A few (perhaps drastic) tweaks to increase readability.
* Increases font size.
* Changes text to be white-on-black.
* Changes link colour to red.
* Centers paragraphs and indents first line.
* Increases text width to 42em.
* Provides a seperate colour for visited links.
* Provides a visual indication when a link is hovered over.
* Improves paragraph spacing.

Changelog:
* fixed the font-family property to be consistent.
* added screenshots.
